name: Turtle Dungeon
description:
In this game it is a very simple build of some of the mechanics I have in the game right now.

WASD to move.

E to activate spin move.

Space to bite.

Ctrl to hide in shell.

Shift to activate shield.

R to load a new level.

Left Mouse to fire cannon.

I have more mechanics fleshed out that I haven't added to this build but more will be on the way!
